channel.title: Reflashing with pre V2 software
channel.description: Hi all. A while ago I got over-excited and flashed the v2 software onto my axo. I understand it's still pretty beta, and really want to go back to the stable release. Are there instructions for going back to the old version? Is it straight forward? WAnted to check whether others had done it before just fiddling around myself and breaking something! Thanks.

item.title: Reflashing with pre V2 software
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Remove everything from the v2 software, and install v1 again. You should get a "firmware mismatch" dialog which will let you install v1.x firmware on your board again.

If the firmware installation doesn't work with this process, you can try the rescue flash from within the v1.x patcher. Described here:

No available USB device found with matching PID/VID

Could you try a "rescue flash": remove power from Axoloti Core, and then connect the micro-USB port to your computer while holding button S1. The LEDs will stay off when in DFU mode.
Then select in the Board menu -> Firmware -> Flash (Rescue)...

Read full topic
